body: $ZIM Don't just keep throwing money at stocks
created_at: wait for a follow-through day. A follow-through day is Day Four or later of a bear market rally and is defined by a gain of at least 1.25% with a larger trading volume than the previous day. Although a follow-through day signifies a recovering stock market
column3: the market can drop again. However
column4: no bear market in history has turned bullish without a follow-through day.
